text:
Raja beta te do chante!  
Mess chalna? Kya? Nhi? Aah! Private video :P

Seriously though, had quite a bit of fun with you. Kaafi understanding wala banda hai tu....mere weird emotional rr sunne ke liye thanks :P 

Hopefully, kabhi milte hai!
author: Hargun Preet Singh Bhatia

text:
Abhi hai library me...aaja :P
1st year me Vijyoshi camp se lekar ab tak kaafi change aa gya tere me xD
Tu jo topics pe discussion karta tha, although mujhe thodi vichitr lagti thi teri baate (aur probably baad me samajh aye) but i feel usse kuch naye persepective mile. 
And 204/403 ka to endsem yaad hi hoga :P
All in all, you are good-natured, humble, easy to talk to nd tum emotions to ache se padh hi lete. 

Hopefully, non-virtually milenge kabhi! 

P.S. Thoda course ke liye bhi padh liya kariye :P
author: Hargun Preet Singh Bhatia
